title: Lusmore and the Gift from the Fairies
description: What would you do if you suddenly came across some fairies singing? That’s what happens to Lusmore in this fairy tale from Ireland told by Kate Corkery. Would you let them know you’re there? As we know, fairies can be tricky. Have a listen and find out if these ones are nasty or nice.
itunes:title: Lusmore and the Gift from the Fairies
itunes:author: Wardour Studios

Would you let them know you’re there? As we know, fairies can be tricky. Have a listen and find out if these ones are nasty or nice.
